ast.name: camera compass
ast.comment: Why look down and miss all the scenery? A compass! A camera! Together, at last!

body.text: 20 lines for 16 displayed ensure smooth transition over 0/360 deg
Highlight cardinal points, -1 to adjust for boundary lines
10 strings for 8 displayed ensure smooth transition over 0/360 deg
Highlight cardinal points, -1 to adjust for boundary lines

xjlKII6wOBTGJX2RB2SMLN32.text: Provides an approximate pixels per degree output

OHzizfOJZMf0BItef4C4Mov6.text: pause for a mo to prevent readings during touch

fDtz2H2LmNO9H9S3qqpDJIqD.text: initial heading used to check and correct if compass sits near 0 / 360 deg

xjd8QAPFwqO2HA0rMlfVmvo5.text: Average 20 readings to try to improve accuracy

KRBQ3T0FG9jO0U0JHva109r1.text: pause for a mo to prevent readings during touch

lTEnvMC0jDGFx2nlX2nmNahu.text: Average 20 readings to try to improve accuracy

wT44McHHNyemETuHaAo8Z8js.text: initial heading used to check and correct if compass sits near 0 / 360 deg

xzte2ec565kufx2o0mToggYx.text: Average 20 readings to try to improve accuracy

lyWdRaO4USDWC23Rm42m6xsU.text: Flips a heading if reference heading is not the same side of the 360 / 0 line

app.comment:
Why look down and miss all the scenery? A compass! A camera! Together, at last!

Now with calibration so you personalize it to your very own phone (thanks for the suggestion White Fox!)
